data.name: Boarding College 2
data.detailed_description:
Story
Elisar Boarding College is an all-female boarding college. Only students who have graduated from Elisar Boarding School are allowed to register at the college. Due to the closed system that the students have been living under through their lives, most of them have turned homosexual.
Two comics included:
-Teachers affair: Maleena is a Chemistry teacher at Elisar Boarding College. There is a rumor going around about her and the Biology teacher having an affair!
-Charlotte part 2: Continue the story of Charlotte and her girlfriend to find out what happens next!

Gameplay
Boarding College 2 is a comics book with choices that lead to different consequences. This comics contains explicit sexual content and nudity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 6600 or better DirectX 12 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.66 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8600 or better, 1080p resolution
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
Boarding College 2 is an interactive comics that contains explicit sexual content and nudity.

Sexual Themes include:
Female x hermaphrodite
Vaginal penetration
Anal penetration
